user.title: Initial Setup
user.description:
Welcome to this integration plugin!
Exclusively written by [@knoop7](https://github.com/knoop7)

Commercial use and secondary modifications are strictly prohibited
Violations will result in update suspension and maintenance code discontinuation


**Traditional Calendar:**
• Real-time display of traditional lunar calendar information
• Accurate prediction of 24 solar terms
• Daily auspicious/inauspicious guidance
• Custom holiday editing

**Birthday Management:**
• Family birthdays
• Bazi and birthday reminder features

**Event Management:**
• Investment and financial reminders
• Work schedule reminders
• Meeting and dinner reminders
• Anniversary reminders

select_description.edit_event: Please select an event to edit

birthday_ai_edit.title: AI Birthday Fortune
birthday_ai_edit.description:
Free public API: [Get a key](https://api.chatanywhere.tech/v1/oauth/free/render)

Free quota: gpt-5 / gpt-4o / gpt-4.1 — 5/day; deepseek-r1 / deepseek-v3.1 — 30/day; gpt-4o-mini / gpt-3.5-turbo / gpt-4.1-mini / gpt-4.1-nano / gpt-5-mini / gpt-5-nano — 200/day.

Recommended model: deepseek-r1 for the best fortune prediction.

edit_holidays.title: Holiday configuration
edit_holidays.description:
**Usage tutorial instructions:**
The configuration file uses YAML format and supports setting **customdays** (customized holidays) **holidays** (holidays) **workdays** (working days), each date format is **YYYY-MM-DD** , support the use of comments, note: prevent other special symbols from entering and damaging normal integration operation.
